ARABIC: وَيَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلرُّوحِ قُلِ ٱلرُّوحُ مِنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّى وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will ask you about the Ruh. Say: 'The Ruh is my Lord's concern. You have only been given a little knowledge.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They ask you about revelation. Say, revelation is by the command of your Lord, and that you have been given but little knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They ask you about "the spirit". Say: "The spirit descends by the command of my Lord, but you have been given only a little knowledge."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They ask you about the Spirit. Say, "The Spirit comes by the command of my Lord. You have been given very little knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They ask you concerning the soul; proclaim “The soul is an entity by the command of my Lord, and you have not received knowledge except a little.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they ask you concerning the Ruh (the spirit). Say: "The Ruh (the spirit) is one of the things, the knowledge of which is only with my Lord. And of knowledge, you (mankind) have been given only a little."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they ask you about the soul. Say: The soul is one of the commands of my Lord, and you are not given aught of knowledge but a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They will question thee concerning the Spirit. Say: 'The Spirit is of the bidding of my Lord. You have been given of knowledge nothing except a little.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They are asking thee concerning the Spirit. Say: The Spirit is by command of my Lord, and of knowledge ye have been vouchsafed but little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They question you about the Spirit. Say, "The Spirit is at my Lord's command, and you have been granted but little knowledge."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they ask thee regarding the spirit, Say thou: the spirit is by the command of my Lord, and ye have not been vouchsafed of knowledge save a little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They question you concerning the Spirit. Say, ‘The Spirit is of the command of my Lord, and you have not been given of the knowledge except a few [of you].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They ask thee concerning the Spirit (of inspiration). Say: "The Spirit (cometh) by command of my Lord: of knowledge it is only a little that is communicated to you, (O men!)"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they ask you (O Muhammad SAW) concerning the Ruh (the Spirit); Say: "The Ruh (the Spirit): it is one of the things, the knowledge of which is only with my Lord. And of knowledge, you (mankind) have been given only a little."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They question you about the spirit. Say: 'The spirit is from the command of my Lord. Except for a little knowledge you have been given nothing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they ask you about the Spirit. Say, “The Spirit belongs to the domain of my Lord; and you were given only little knowledge.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:85] And they will question you, that is, the Jews, concerning the Spirit, from which the body receives life. Say, to them: ‘The Spirit is of the command of my Lord, that is, [it belongs to] His knowledge, about which you know not. And of knowledge you have not been given except a little’, relative to His knowledge, exalted be He.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They will ask thee) Muhammad (concerning the Spirit) it was the people of Mecca-Abu Jahl and his host- who asked. (Say: The Spirit is by command of my Lord) the Spirit is of the marvels of my Lord; it is also said that this means: it is the restricted knowledge of my Lord, (and of knowledge) which is with Allah (ye have been vouchsafed) you have been given (but little).
